subject: Horse Racing
Kentucky Derby
lead_paragraph: On a day of evil weather, trainer Todd Pletcher finally won the Kentucky Derby after going 0 for 24 in the nine previous years, with Calvin Borel taking Super Saver home in what was Borel’s staked territory along the rail.
snippet: On a day of evil weather, trainer Todd Pletcher finally won the Kentucky Derby after going 0 for 24 in the nine previous years, with Calvin Borel taking Super Saver home in what was Borel’s staked territory along the rail.
